response.message: Congratulations to all the new moderators!
Congratulations and may the Patience be with you.
Congratulations to all of you, especially to Mark Henderson and Sysadmin1138, my new colleagues on Serverfault.com!
Well done guys!....looks we've got another bunch of safe hands again this year.
Congratulations to all the new moderators, and a big thanks to everyone who volunteered.  The help is much appreciated.
Congrats everyone!!  And thanks to all those who voted for me!

I am extremely impressed with the new election system. (Yes, I know Math.SE had it first, but I didn't participate on that site.)

Also, a hearty congratulations to the new mods (especially the Stack Overflow ones since I'm there more often).
Congratulations to the new moderators. I participated in the elections and did vote my share. Pleasantly surprised to note the new moderators. System - You have done well too! :)
